item.description:
I was wondering may be I should try something a little different than picking a movie or a restaurant and force it on everyone as a movie meetup. So I am going to post a recurring meetup occurs every third Friday and request all of you to suggest interested movie names and any fun activities that you would like to do with the rest of the group. You can provide your suggestions as a comment in your RSVP. Fun activities can be dinner, happy hour, drinks, current events, shopping, movie discussions or any other interesting activities suitable for this group at the time. I will choose the most popular suggestions for that specific week and update everyone on the exact plans closer to the actual date.

Really appreciate all of your feedback and suggestions for each month.

-------------OCT-15-----------------------
The showtimes for Oct-15 is given below: We will finalize one or two movies by Thursday. I will send out the final details on Thursday night.

.
The Social Network
Show Time: 7.00 PM
Runtime: 2 hr. 1 min.
Genres: Drama
Cast:Jesse Eisenberg, Justin Timberlake, Andrew Garfield, Rashida Jones


Life As We Know It
Show Time: 6.50 PM
Runtime: 1 hr. 52 min.
Genres: Comedy
Cast:Katherine Heigl, Josh Duhamel, Josh Lucas, Jean Smart.

Secretariat
Show Time: 6.55 PM
Genres: Drama
Cast:Diane Lane, John Malkovich, Dylan Walsh, Scott Glenn, Dylan Baker.

Red
Show Time: 6.45 PM
Genres: Action/Adventure, Comedy
Cast:Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, Helen Mirren, Mary-Louise Parker.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.how_to_find_us: I will send detailed information closer to each event.
item.name: Movies on Fridays!
